Text.Page:
Our holy grounds are being defiled by those cursed Lokians! The Lake of Tears is a monument to Elinu herself!

We can't let it continue. Kill the {@LinkCreature:23#17#Lokian bloodweavers} and {@LinkCreature:23#16#blackguards} at once. Nature will strike back.

I'm glad those wretches are dead, but I wonder why they were here in the first place. Something for me to ponder.

Oh, well. Nice job killing things, !
